pages.title: Register to the Find a Covid-19 Test Provider Abroad service

components.name: rhnpiT
components.content:
COVID-19 test providers based outside of the UK can register online to be added to the Foreign, Commonwealth & Development Office’s Find a COVID-19 Test Provider Abroad service.

British nationals may use this service to help them book a COVID-19 test abroad before they return home to the UK.

You can sign up on behalf of your organisation.

To be eligible to be added to the COVID-19 test providers list you need:

  • someone at your organisation able to speak English
  • to be legally authorised to provide COVID-19 tests that meet the applicable standard ("UK standards") for travellers returning to England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland
  • to provide COVID-19 tests results via email, SMS or printed paper in English, French or Spanish
  • up to date contact details

Please read the coronavirus test guidance for more information on UK standards for Covid-19 test providers.

pages.title: Summary
Does someone at your organisation speak English?

components.name: speakEnglish
components.title: Does someone at your organisation speak fluent English?

pages.title: Is your organisation authorised to provide COVID-19 tests?

components.name: isQualified
components.title: Is your organisation authorised to provide COVID-19 tests?

pages.title: Main point of contact

components.name: beQbsQ
components.content:
<div class="govuk-hint"> Provide the details of the main point of contact for your organisation. This should be the person who can be contacted by the British embassy.  <div/>

<div class="govuk-hint">These details are for the embassy only and will not be shared publically <div/>

pages.title: Organisation name
Website address

components.name: websiteAddress
components.title: Website address
components.hint: This will be published on GOV.UK

pages.title: Email address

components.name: emailAddress
components.title: Email address
components.hint: This is the email address your company or facility wishes to be contacted on by British nationals. This will be published on GOV.UK.

pages.title: How can people book a COVID-19 test with your organisation?

components.name: bookingOptions
components.title: Booking options
components.hint: Choose as many options as relevant

pages.title: Can your organisation provide COVID-19 test results in English, French or Spanish?

components.name: mCWgAH
components.content: When you send the results of a COVID-19 test to an individual they must be written in English, French or Spanish.

components.name: provideResultsInEnglishFrenchSpanish
components.title: Can your organisation provide COVID-19 test results in English, French or Spanish?

pages.title: How quickly can your organisation provide the result of a COVID-19 test?

components.name: turnaroundTime
components.title: How quickly can your company or facility provide the result of a COVID-19 test?
components.hint: This is the fastest time in hours it takes from someone taking a COVID-19 test to receiving their test result.

pages.title: Your organisation cannot be added to this service

components.name: gjJiCS
components.content: Your organisation cannot be added to the Find a COVID-19 Test Provider Abroad service if you are not authorised to provide COVID-19 tests.

pages.title: Telephone number

components.name: phoneNumber
components.title: Phone number
components.hint: This is the phone number your company or facility wishes to be contacted on by British nationals. This will be published on GOV.UK.

pages.title: Address

components.name: pumJJx
components.content: This will be published on GOV.UK

pages.title: Declaration

components.name: VUylUR
components.content:
You must declare that you are:

  • currently qualified to provide COVID-19 tests
  • supply COVID-19 tests to UK standard
  • reliable and willing to help on a regular basis
  • able to respond within a reasonable timeframe to client requests
  • willing to update or re-confirm your details on a bi-annual basis on request
  • aware that inclusion on the Find a COVID-19 Test Supplier Abroad service is not an endorsement by the FCDO and you are not affiliated to the FCDO in any way
  • aware that you cannot use the FCDO or the embassy logo on your website

pages.title: Your organisation cannot be added to this service

components.name: vCQCMd
components.content: Your organisation can only be added to the Find a Covid-19 Test Provider Abroad service if someone at your organisation speaks fluent English.

pages.title: Your organisation cannot be added to this service

components.name: duqJXO
components.content: Your organisation cannot be added to the Find a COVID-19 Test Provider Abroad service if you cannot communicate COVID-19 test results in either English, French or Spanish.

pages.title: How does your organisation provide confirmation of a COVID-19 test result?

components.name: resultsFormat
components.title: How does your company or facility provide confirmation of a COVID-19 test result?
components.hint: Choose as many options as relevant. You must provide confirmation in at least one of these formats to meet the requirements.

pages.title: Can your organisation provide COVID-19 tests that meet UK standards?

components.name: sKaEis
components.content: The test must meet performance standards of ≥97% specificity and ≥80% sensitivity at viral loads above 100,000 copies/ml. Types of tests you could provide include a nucleic acid test, including a polymerase chain reaction (PCR) test; derivative technologies including loop-mediated isothermal amplification (LAMP) tests; or an antigen test, such as a test from a lateral flow device.

components.name: meetUKstandards
components.title: Can your organisation provide COVID-19 tests that meet UK standards?

pages.title: Your organisation cannot be added to this service

components.name: vTPFBI
components.content:
<div class="govuk-hint"> Your organisation cannot be added to the Find a COVID-19 Test Provider Abroad service if you are not able to provide COVID-19 tests that meet UK standards.
<div/>

pages.title: What are the opening times of your organisation?

components.name: openingTimes
components.title: Opening times
components.hint:
Please state the days of the week you are open, followed by the hours, for example Monday to Friday, 9am-5pm. 

If you are open at the weekend, please also specify your opening times on Saturday and Sunday for example, Saturday, 10am-5pm, Sunday 11am-3pm.

pages.title: Does your organisation provide COVID-19 test results on the days you are not open?

components.name: provideResultsWhenClosed
components.hint: For example, if you are not open at the weekend and are unable to provide a test result in your usual timescale.
components.title: Does your company or facility provide COVID-19 test results on the days you are not open?

pages.title: Which body has authorised your organisation to provide COVID-19 tests?

components.name: regulatoryAuthority
components.title: Which body has authorised your organisation to provide COVID-19 tests?
components.hint: For example the government, a medical association or other relevant authority

pages.title: Is your organisation able to provide Covid-19 tests within 72 hours?

components.name: provideTestResultsIn72Hours
components.title: Is your organisation able to provide Covid-19 tests within 72 hours?
components.hint: This is the time it takes from a person taking a test to receiving a result.

pages.title: Your organisation cannot be added to this service

components.name: FaxMPv
components.content: Your organisation cannot be added to the Find a COVID-19 Test Provider Abroad service if you cannot provide COVID-19 test results within 72 hours of someone taking a test.
